title: mOhana naDai naDandu
sahitya:
(rAgA:  brndAvanasArangA)  
  mOhana naDai naDandu muruga vEl vandAn mOha isai pADi mutta mazhai pozhindAn
dAhamuDam en kai tavip-piDitt-izhuppAn tanjam enra ennai nenjamadu azhaippAn
				(rAgA:  ranjani)


anupallavi

  SaNmukhanaikkugahanda paNgaLai isaittirundEn shaktivEl kumaranai bhktiyAi magizhdirundAn
uNmaiyil avan tanda uyar sukham ennenbEn uLLam pugunda kandan uyirinil konruviTTAn
				(rAg  amrtiavarSiNi)


caraNam 1    sAdA varam aruLum shankaran tarum maganai sakala bhuvanangaLai sATriDum arum guhanai
EkAntamuDanE eNNiDa inikkudaDi enrum avanai eNNI idayamum urugudaDi
    caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  Aa:S R2 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 M1 G2 R2 S  shrIrangam mEvum sArangapANiyin selvat-tiru marugan singAra vElavan
pArengum pOTrum pArvatiyin bAlan pAvai enai kAkkum dEva guNa shIlan
    caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  kAnaDA)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 D N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G2 M1 R2 S  anbu seivOr maddiyil ADi varum azhagan agandaiyillAl enrum aruL suram tarum kuzhagan
inbamellAm UTTam enniyurkkoru tuNaivan en manam nirainduviTTAl enakkoru kuraiyum uNDO
